pages.text: Like in normal Create, cobble can be crushed into gravel which can be crushed into sand. Unlike in normal Create, each TFC sand type can be further crushed for a chance to receive a $(thing)Trace Element$().$(br2)$(br2)$(thing)White Sand$() can be refined from Granite, Diorite, Chalk, Rhyolite, Dacite and Marble.

$(thing)Brown Sand$() from Conglomerate, Gabbro, Slate and Gneiss.$(br2)$(thing)Black Sand$() from Shale, Dolomite, Basalt and Andesite.$(br2)$(thing)Yellow Sand$() from Claystone and Limestone.$(br2)$(thing)Red Sand$() from Chert and Phyllite.$(br2)$(thing)Green Sand$() from Schist.$(br2)$(thing)Pink Sand$() from Quartzite.
White Sand can be crushed into $(thing)Saltpeter$(), which can be used to produce Gunpowder, milled into Salt or used as a fertilizer.
Brown Sand can be crushed into $(thing)Sulfur$(), used solely for the production of Gunpowder.
Black Sand can be crushed into $(thing)Coke Powder$(), used in $(l:patchouli:create_integration/charcoal_upgrading)Charcoal Upgrading$().
Yellow Sand can be crushed into $(thing)Glowstone Dust$(), used to make various everlasting light sources.

pages.title: Red Sand
pages.text: Red sand can be crushed into $(thing)Redstone Dust$(), a necessary component in the production of $(thing)Rose Quartz.$()
Green Sand can be crushed into $(thing)Guano$(), which is a powerful fertilizer and required for the production of many stone types.

Pink Sand can be crushed into $(thing)Kaolinite Powder$(), used to make $(thing)Fire CLay$(). It is also used in $(l:patchouli:create_integration/potion_making)Potion Making$().$(br2)Only being obtainable from $(thing)Quartzite Rock$(), Kaolinite is the rarest Trace Element.
